products_entries.full_product_description: CHIEF CONTROLLER OF EXPLOSIVE( CCE) CERTIFICATES FOR FIELD ELECTRICAL/ ELECTRONIC INSTRUMENTS & ACCESSORIES AND EQUIPMENTS Obtaining  certificate of approval from Chief Controller Of Explosives( CCE) for field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments  based on type test certificate made available from the instrument vendors including submission of  application to statutory authorities , necessary fees, all test certificates, equipment drawings in required volumes, interaction with the authorities, follow-up for  approval, obtaining necessary approval certificate before energization of field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments.
products_entries.core_product_name: certificate of approval for field electrical or electronic instruments and accessories and equipments
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: issuing authority: chief controller of explosives (cce), based on: type test certificate from instrument vendors, includes: submission of application to statutory authorities, includes: necessary fees, includes: all test certificates, includes: equipment drawings in required volumes, includes: interaction with authorities, includes: follow-up for approval, includes: obtaining necessary approval certificate before energization
